document_data.name: Beldimarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Beldimarr''' was a [[Harper]] operating as a caravan driver in the [[Sword Coast]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance: Beldimarr had a snakelike scar down his right temple all the way to his neck and hairy chest. He had relatively poor dental hygiene.
document_data.Relationships: As of {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Tessaril Winter]] was aware of Arauntar and [[Beldimarr]]'s status as [[Harper]]s. Both of them worked for [[Orthil Voldovan]], who wasn't a Harper himself.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|16,18-19|1}} She, too, was an acquaintance of his'.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|60-64|4}} Arauntar and Beldimarr had a pact to kill each other if the other was to ever be mortally wounded and left in agony.
